IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: WHEELER PROVIDES EQUITABLE ACCESS TO INNOVATIVE CARE THAT IMPROVES HEALTH, RECOVERY AND GROWTH AT ALL STAGES OF LIFE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: WHEELER CLINIC, INC. PROVIDES EQUITABLE ACCESS TO INNOVATIVE CARE THAT IMPROVES HEALTH, RECOVERY AND GROWTH AT ALL STAGES OF LIFE.
IRS990.Desc: HEALTH AND WELLNESS . . . AS A FEDERALLY QUALIFIED HEALTH CENTER WHEELER OFFERS INTEGRATED PRIMARY CARE, BEHAVIORAL HEALTH PREVENTIVE DENTAL AND SUPPORT SERVICES TO MEDICALLY-UNDERSERVED, LOW-INCOME AND VULNERABLE POPULATIONS IN BRISTOL, HARTFORD, WATERBURY, PLAINVILLE, NEW BRITAIN AND SURROUNDING TOWNS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: CHILDREN'S OUTPATIENT & COMMUNITY-BASED SERVICES. . . PROVIDES A CONTINUUM OF CRISIS, OUTPATIENT, DAY TREATMENT AND INTENSIVE IN-HOME PROGRAMS AND SERVICES FOR CHILDREN AND FAMILIES INVOLVED THE DEPARTMENTS OF CHILDREN AND FAMILIES AND DEVELOPMENTAL SERVICES AS WELL AS YOUTH INVOLVED IN THE JUVENILE COURTS. OUR HOME-LIKE ENVIRONMENT FOR CHILDREN WITH BEHAVIORAL HEALTH CHALLENGES AND CHILD WHO HAVE BEEN REMOVED FROM THEIR HOME DUE TO ABUSE OR NEGLECT. SERVICES ARE PROVIDED IN CLINIC FACILITIES IN BRISTOL, HARTFORD, MIDDLETOWN, NEW HAVEN, PLAINVILLE AND WATERBURY AS WELL AS IN HOMES, SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITIES IN ALL OR PART OF HARTFORD, FAIRFIELD, LITCHFIELD, MIDDLESEX, NEW HAVEN AND TOLLAND COUNTIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY-BASED FAMILY SERVICES . . . PROVIDE FAMILY STRENGTHENING, INTENSIVE IN-HOME, THERAPEUTIC FOSTER CARE, AND JUVENILE RISK REDUCTION INTERVENTION SERVICES TO CHILDREN AND FAMILIES INVOLVED IN CHILD WELFARE AND JUVENILE JUSTICE SYSTEMS. THE DEPARTMENT ALSO INCLUDES AN INNOVATIVE PRIMARY CARE/BEHAVIORAL HEALTH INTEGRATION PROGRAM, AND PRACTICE INNOVATION PROJECTS INITIATIVES. SERVICES ARE PROVIDED IN HARTFORD, NEW BRITAIN, PLAINVILLE AND WATERBURY AS WELL AS IN COMMUNITY SETTINGS THROUGHOUT THE GREATER HARTFORD, NEW BRITAIN/BRISTOL AND WATERBURY COMMUNITIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: CONNECTICUT CENTER FOR PREVENTION, WELLNESS AND RECOVERY IS THE STATE'S MOST COMPREHENSIVE RESOURCE FOR BEHAVIORAL HEALTH INFORMATION AND A LEADING PROVIDER OF PROFESSIONAL TRAINING AND DEVELOPMENT OPPORTUNITIES, AND PREVENTION AND HEALTH PROMOTION SERVICES STATEWIDE. THE DEPARTMENT INCLUDES THE WHEELER EMPLOYEE ASSISTANCE PROGRAM.
CHILDREN'S EDUCATIONAL SERVICES . . . INCLUDE ACADEMIC AND CLINICAL SUPPORTS FOR CHILDREN AND ADOLESCENTS WITH SERIOUS BEHAVIOR CHALLENGES WHO ARE REFERRED BY PUBLIC SCHOOLS FROM 50 TOWNS.

ADULT SERVICES . . . PROVIDES A BROAD RANGE OF INTERVENTION, RECOVERY AND RECIDIVISM REDUCTION PROGRAMS FOR INDIVIDUALS INVOLVED WITH JUSTICE SYSTEM, AS WELL AS BEHAVIORAL HEALTH SUPPORTS FOR THE COMMUNITY. THESE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED IN FACILITIES IN BRISTOL, HARTFORD, MIDDLETOWN, MERIDEN, NEW BRITAIN, PLAINVILLE AND WATERBURY AS WELL AS IN STATE FACILITIES.

EARLY CHILDHOOD AND EVALUATION SERVICES . . . INCLUDES STATE AND FEDERALLY FUNDED PROGRAMS THAT SUPPORT YOUNG CHILDREN, PARENTS/CAREGIVERS AND EARLY CHILDHOOD EDUCATORS IN HOMES SCHOOLS AND COMMUNITIES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PAYMENTS TO A REGISTERED LOBBYING FIRM FOR THE PURPOSE OF STAYING ABREAST AND EXPRESSING CONCERNS AND OPINIONS ABOUT CURRENT STATE OF CONNECTICUT PROPOSED LEGISLATION.
POST RETIREMENT BENEFIT COST BENEFIT REQUIRED BY ASC 715

PART V, LINE 4: IT IS THE POLICY OF THE CLINIC'S BOARD OF TRUSTEES TO DISTRIBUTE ANNUALLY UP TO 5% OF A TRAILING THREE CALENDAR YEAR AVERAGE OF THE BOARD DESIGNATED ENDOWMENT TOTAL ASSET VALUE, WITH THE UNDERSTANDING THAT THIS SPENDING RATE PLUS INFLATION WILL NOT NORMALLY EXCEED TOTAL REAL RETURN (RETURN NET OF INFLATION) FROM INVESTMENTS. ON THE RECOMMENDATION OF THE CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER AND THE FINANCE COMMITTEE, THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES MAY APPROVE ADDITIONAL DISTRIBUTIONS FROM THE BOARD DESIGNATED ENDOWMENT FUND FOR INVESTMENTS IN NEW PROGRAMS OR FACILITIES OR OTHER URGENT CLINIC NEEDS. THE FINANCE COMMITTEE WILL PERIODICALLY REVIEW THE SPENDING POLICY AGAINST ACTUAL RETURNS IN ORDER TO MAKE ADJUSTMENTS NECESSARY FOR THE PRESERVATION OF PURCHASING POWER OF THE BOARD DESIGNATED ENDOWMENT FUND.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: YOUNG WOMENS CHRISTIAN ASSOCIATION OF NEW BRITAIN (YWCA)

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: PURPOSE OF GRANT OR ASSISTANCE: TO PROVIDE FACILITY, ADMINISTRATIVE AND DIRECT SERVICES RELATED TO THE TITCC/LEAPP PROGRAM.

THE PURPOSE OF THE GRANT IS TO ORGANIZE AND DELIVER SERVICES FOR THE TRANSITIONAL SUPPORTS FOR EMERGING ADULTS PROGRAM. THIS SERVICE WILL HELP SUPPORT THE PROGRAM IN IMPLEMENTING THE PROPRIETARY PROGRAM WITH FIDELITY, YOUTH VILLAGES WILL ASSIST WITH SUCH SERVICES AS; ASSISTING YOUNG PEOPLE TO IMPROVE THERE FUTURE OUTCOMES, ASSIST WITH VARIOUS TRAININGS, ASSIST WITH BRAND AND MATERIALS, CLINICAL CONSULTATION, NETWORK OFFERINGS, AND WITH PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENT SUPPORT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WHEELER CLINIC DEPARTMENT VICE PRESIDENTS MONITOR THE FULFILLMENT OF PROGRAM REQUIREMENTS. THE ORGANIZATIONS PROVIDE PERIODIC FINANCIAL UPDATES, WHICH ARE REVIEWED BY WHEELER CLINIC STAFF TO ENSURE THE FUNDS ARE SPENT ON THE TYPES OF EXPENSES NECESSARY AND APPROPRIATE TO MEET THE INTENDED PROGRAM NEEDS. IF APPLICABLE, ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, THE ORGANIZATION'S CONSOLIDATED AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND FEDERAL AND STATE SINGLE AUDIT REPORTS ARE REVIEWED BY WHEELER CLINIC STAFF.

RltdOrgOfficerTrstKeyEmplGrp.TitleTxt: VP AND PRINCIPAL NW VILLAGE SCHOOL

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE 990 IS PREPARED BY AN INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT AND REVIEWED BY THE CEO, CFO, AUDIT COMMITTEE AND BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THERE ARE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICIES FOR BOTH THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND STAFF. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES AND EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN OFF ON THE POLICY ANNUALLY AND DISCLOSE AT ANY POINT THEY BECAME AWARE OF A POTENTIAL OR ACTUAL CONFLICT. EMPLOYEES, VOLUNTEERS, INTERNS AND TRUSTEES ARE ALSO ORIENTED TO THE POLICIES ON HIRE AND ANNUALLY. DISCLOSURE STATEMENTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE APPLICABLE DEPARTMENT VICE PRESIDENT AND THE CHIEF HUMAN RESOURCES OFFICER FOR ACTIONS AS REQUIRED. THE QA VICE PRESIDENT KEEPS DATA ON THE NUMBER AND TYPE OF CONFLICTS REPORTED AND ACTIONS TAKEN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES OF WHEELER CLINIC ADOPTED A COMPENSATION PHILOSOPHY STATEMENT WHICH PROVIDES GENERAL GUIDELINES FOR IMPLEMENTING THE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION PROGRAM. THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PERFORMS THE EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION REVIEW ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AND ROUTINELY ENGAGES AN OUTSIDE, INDEPENDENT FIRM TO PREPARE AN EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION STUDY THAT INCLUDES COMPARABILITY DATA. THE MOST RECENT STUDIES WERE COMPLETED IN 2016 AND 2018.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REQUESTS ARE SENT TO THE PUBLIC RELATIONS DEPARTMENT WHO WILL RESPOND WITHIN 10 DAYS. THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE PROVIDED AT THE ORGANIZATION'S DISCRETION.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
